verses.text: \w In|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H3060"\w* \w seventh|strong="H7651"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Jehu's \w rule|strong="H4427"\w*, \w Jehoash|strong="H3060"\w* \w became|strong="H4427"\w* \w king|strong="H4427"\w*; \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H8141"\w* \w was|strong="H1121"\w* ruling \w for|strong="H8141"\w* forty \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* Jerusalem; \w his|strong="H3060"\w* mother's name \w was|strong="H1121"\w* Zibiah \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Beer-sheba.

\w Jehoash|strong="H3060"\w* did what \w was|strong="H8034"\w* right \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H8034"\w* eyes \w of|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H8034"\w* Lord all \w his|strong="H3060"\w* \w days|strong="H8141"\w*, because \w he|strong="H3389"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* guided \w by|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H8034"\w* teaching \w of|strong="H8141"\w* Jehoiada \w the|strong="H8034"\w* priest.

\w But|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* high \w places|strong="H3605"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* not taken \w away|strong="H3605"\w*; \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H0834"\w* went \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w making|strong="H6213"\w* \w offerings|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* burning \w them|strong="H3384"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* high \w places|strong="H3605"\w*.

\w And|strong="H2076"\w* Jehoash said \w to|strong="H6999"\w* \w the|strong="H5493"\w* \w priests|strong="H3808"\w*, \w All|strong="H5750"\w* \w the|strong="H5493"\w* money \w of|strong="H1116"\w* \w the|strong="H5493"\w* holy \w things|strong="H3808"\w*, which comes \w into|strong="H5493"\w* \w the|strong="H5493"\w* house \w of|strong="H1116"\w* \w the|strong="H5493"\w* Lord, (\w the|strong="H5493"\w* amount fixed \w for|strong="H3808"\w* every man's payment,) \w and|strong="H2076"\w* \w all|strong="H5750"\w* \w the|strong="H5493"\w* money given \w by|strong="H3808"\w* \w any|strong="H5750"\w* man freely \w from|strong="H5493"\w* \w the|strong="H5493"\w* impulse \w of|strong="H1116"\w* \w his|strong="H5493"\w* heart,

\w Let|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w take|strong="H0935"\w*, \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w from|strong="H0935"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* friends \w and|strong="H0935"\w* neighbours, \w to|strong="H0413"\w* make good \w what|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* damaged \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w wherever|strong="H0834"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w be|strong="H0376"\w* seen.

\w But|strong="H2388"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* twenty-third year \w of|strong="H1004"\w* King Jehoash, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w had|strong="H0834"\w* not \w made|strong="H2388"\w* good \w the|strong="H3605"\w* damaged parts \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w* \w Jehoash|strong="H3060"\w* sent \w for|strong="H1004"\w* Jehoiada \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* other \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* said \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w*, \w Why|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w made|strong="H2388"\w* good what \w is|strong="H4428"\w* damaged \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*? \w now|strong="H1961"\w* \w take|strong="H2388"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w more|strong="H3808"\w* money \w from|strong="H1961"\w* \w your|strong="H3808"\w* neighbours, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w give|strong="H1961"\w* \w it|strong="H1961"\w* \w for|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* building \w up|strong="H0853"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

\w So|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w made|strong="H5414"\w* \w an|strong="H5414"\w* agreement \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w no|strong="H0369"\w* \w more|strong="H0369"\w* \w money|strong="H3701"\w* \w from|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w people|strong="H0408"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w not|strong="H0369"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w make|strong="H5414"\w* good \w what|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H0369"\w* damaged \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

\w But|strong="H2388"\w* Jehoiada \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w a|strong="H3947"\w* chest, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w making|strong="H2388"\w* \w a|strong="H3947"\w* hole \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* cover \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w it|strong="H3947"\w*, \w put|strong="H3947"\w* \w it|strong="H3947"\w* \w by|strong="H3701"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* altar, \w on|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* right side when \w one|strong="H1004"\w* comes \w into|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Lord; \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w who|strong="H3548"\w* kept \w the|strong="H0853"\w* door \w put|strong="H3947"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w it|strong="H3947"\w* regularly all \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w money|strong="H3701"\w* \w which|strong="H1004"\w* \w was|strong="H1004"\w* \w taken|strong="H3947"\w* \w into|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Lord.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w when|strong="H0935"\w* \w they|strong="H8033"\w* saw \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w much|strong="H3605"\w* \w money|strong="H3701"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w chest|strong="H0727"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* king's scribe \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* high \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* bags, noting \w the|strong="H3605"\w* amount \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w money|strong="H3701"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w money|strong="H3701"\w* \w which|strong="H1004"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* measured \w out|strong="H7200"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w gave|strong="H1961"\w* regularly \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w those|strong="H0853"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* responsible \w for|strong="H3588"\w* overseeing \w the|strong="H0853"\w* work, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* these \w gave|strong="H1961"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* payment \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* woodworkers \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* builders \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* working \w on|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*,

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* wall-builders \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* stone-cutters, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w get|strong="H3318"\w* \w wood|strong="H6086"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* cut stone \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w building|strong="H1129"\w* \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* broken \w parts|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* everything needed \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* good \w order|strong="H3027"\w*.

\w But|strong="H2388"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* money \w was|strong="H0834"\w* not \w used|strong="H3605"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w making|strong="H3605"\w* silver cups \w or|strong="H1004"\w* scissors \w or|strong="H1004"\w* basins \w or|strong="H1004"\w* wind-instruments \w or|strong="H1004"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* vessels \w of|strong="H1004"\w* gold \w or|strong="H1004"\w* silver \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*;

\w But|strong="H0389"\w* \w it|strong="H6213"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* given \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* workmen \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w were|strong="H3627"\w* building \w up|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* get \w any|strong="H5414"\w* statement \w of|strong="H1004"\w* accounts \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w men|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* whom \w the|strong="H0853"\w* money \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w workmen|strong="H4399"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w use|strong="H4399"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* good faith.

\w The|strong="H0853"\w* \w money|strong="H3701"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w offerings|strong="H3588"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* error \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* sin-offerings \w was|strong="H0834"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w taken|strong="H5414"\w* \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* house \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Lord; \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w was|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* priests'.

\w Then|strong="H1961"\w* Hazael, king \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Aram, \w went|strong="H0935"\w* \w up|strong="H0935"\w* \w against|strong="H0935"\w* Gath \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w took|strong="H1961"\w* \w it|strong="H1961"\w*; \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* purpose \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w go|strong="H0935"\w* \w up|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* Jerusalem.

\w Then|strong="H0227"\w* Jehoash, \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Judah, \w took|strong="H3920"\w* \w all|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* holy things which Jehoshaphat \w and|strong="H4428"\w* Jehoram \w and|strong="H4428"\w* Ahaziah \w his|strong="H5921"\w* fathers, \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Judah, \w had|strong="H4428"\w* given \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* Lord, \w together|strong="H5921"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* things \w he|strong="H0227"\w* \w himself|strong="H6440"\w* \w had|strong="H4428"\w* given, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w all|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* gold \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* Temple store \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* king's house, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w sent|strong="H5927"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w Hazael|strong="H2371"\w*, \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Aram|strong="H0758"\w*; \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w he|strong="H0227"\w* \w went|strong="H5927"\w* \w away|strong="H5927"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

Now \w the|strong="H3605"\w* rest \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* acts \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Joash|strong="H3060"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w did|strong="H0834"\w*, \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* not \w recorded|strong="H5927"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* book \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* history \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Israel?

\w And|strong="H3063"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* servants \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H0834"\w* secret design \w and|strong="H3063"\w* put \w Joash|strong="H3101"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* death \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* house \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Millo \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w way|strong="H1697"\w* \w down|strong="H3789"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* Silla.

\w And|strong="H6965"\w* Jozacar, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* son \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Shimeath, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* Jehozabad, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* son \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Shomer, \w his|strong="H5221"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, \w came|strong="H3381"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w him|strong="H5221"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w put|strong="H3381"\w* \w him|strong="H5221"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* death; \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w they|strong="H5221"\w* \w put|strong="H3381"\w* \w him|strong="H5221"\w* \w into|strong="H3381"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* earth \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w his|strong="H5221"\w* fathers \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* town \w of|strong="H1004"\w* David; \w and|strong="H6965"\w* Amaziah \w his|strong="H5221"\w* son became king \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w his|strong="H5221"\w* \w place|strong="H1004"\w*.
